title: Where are the best colleges for maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dude, there are no specific colleges for maths,it's the entire universities and their respective departments that determine the quality of education anywhere in India.Some of the best universities offering UG/PG courses in Mathematics are- Delhi UniversityJNUHyderabad UniversityIISc,BangaloreIIT,KanpurVIT,ChennaiAligarh Muslim UniversityIIT,ChennaiUniversity of CalcuttaBHU,Varanasi.

Consider applying for the Chennai Mathematical Institute if it is not too late. If you are an olympiad winner you get to a direct admit. Indian Statistical institute is also good. Career opportunities after a statistical course are going to be quite easy with the advent of Big Data analysis
